lead_paragraph: - The Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF) has announced a benefit game between Brazil and Colombia on Jan. 25, the same day Chapecoense play their first game since the air crash that prompted the friendly.

headline.print_headline: Brazil to Meet Colombia in Chapecoense Benefit Game
headline.main: Brazil to Meet Colombia in Chapecoense Benefit Game
